Dataset: webnlg

Here is the data, now generate text using the provided data:

final_response: "Nord" is an album by Year of No Light, released on September 6, 2006. The album blends the genres of sludge metal and post-metal, and was both produced by Year of No Light and released under the Crucial Blast label. "Nord" was followed by the album "Live at Roadburn 2008."
